name: Senseless Procedural Architecture
description:
[19-10-2020]
I don't often pull out Cinema4D because rendering takes to much time for daily projects, and I don't own any third party rendering software which have evolved to be the norm in 3D.Sometimes I create something and output no higher than 640x640. Which is the case for this procedural architecture looping piece. 

[23-10-21]
Minting this 1:1 | 640x640 | 180 Frames | 30FPS
Cinema 4D project file available on my Patreon https://www.patreon.com/posts/55267592  


Patreon another space that I occupy to curate extra elements like project files and tutorials for the supporters who wants to have access to VIP stuff available nowhere else. Its also another way to support me in a recursive monthly manner. There is several Tiers you can pledge for but my focus is rather on making the most available for the lowest tier. Higher tiers grants you the ability to do stuff like discuss with me privately, personalized consultations on NFT creation and Advanced After Effects coaching.
